(Simplified: 医)
Pictophonetic: 殹 indicates the sound; 酉 (wine) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:

醫生 [ yī shēng ]: doctor; Classifiers: 个
醫療 [ yī liáo ]: medical treatment
醫學 [ yī xué ]: medicine; medical science; study of medicine
醫藥 [ yī yào ]: medical care and medicines; medicine (drug); medical; pharmaceutical

heisig_chinese_memo: This is a budget physician who is constantly sipping his whiskey bottle.  To diagnose he has a dart board of illnesses which he throws a dart at like a missile after putting a box on top of his head.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the doctor (医) with the lance shaft (殳) or the sake flask (酉) is the doctor you need
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The physician puts the cardboard box on his head and throws a dart at a chart to determine his patients' illnesses.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " unitary ", " Yi " sound, represent people for medical treatment. "Shuowen": "Healers also work. Annihilation, bad posture. The nature of medicine is natural, you can get wine. Congyou. Wang Yu said. One said: "Annihilation, sickness. Wine cures diseases. "Li" has medical wine. The ancient Wu Pengchu was a doctor." "Book of Rites-The Second Qu Li": "If you do not cure the third world, you should not take the medicine."

" Doctor " can mean medical skills and medicine. "Historical Records-Wanshi Zhang Shu Biography": "The man who ordered Zhou Wen in the Langzhong was named Ren, and his deceased was also a native of the city. See by the doctor."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " unitary ", " Yi " sound, represent people for medical treatment.
humanum_full_description:
從「酉」，「殹」聲，表示治病的人。《說文》：「治病工也。殹，惡姿也。醫之性然，得酒而使。从酉。王育說。一曰：殹，病聲。酒所以治病也。《周禮》有醫酒。古者巫彭初作醫。」 《禮記‧曲禮下》：「醫不三世，不服其藥。」

　　「醫」可表示醫術、醫學。《史記‧萬石張叔列傳》：「郎中令周文者，名仁，其先故任城人也。以醫見。」
humanum_short_description: 從「酉」，「殹」聲，表示治病的人。

English Definition: medical; medicine; doctor; to cure; to treat

Pictophonetic: 殹 indicates the sound; 酉 (wine) conveys the meaning.

    • 酉 [ yǒu ] wine; wine vessel; chemical

Kanshudo mnemonic:the doctor (医) with the lance shaft (殳) or the sake flask (酉) is the doctor you need
Chinese: This is a budget physician who is constantly sipping his whiskey bottle. To diagnose he has a dart board of illnesses which he throws a dart at like a missile after putting a box on top of his head.
Meaning: physician
Hanzi: 医
Story: The physician puts the cardboard box on his head and throws a dart at a chart to determine his patients' illnesses.
Kind: traditional

從「 酉 」，「 殹 」聲，表示治病的人。《說文》：「治病工也。殹，惡姿也。醫之性然，得酒而使。从酉。王育說。一曰：殹，病聲。酒所以治病也。《周禮》有醫酒。古者巫彭初作醫。」 《禮記‧曲禮下》：「醫不三世，不服其藥。」 「 醫 」可表示醫術、醫學。《史記‧萬石張叔列傳》：「郎中令周文者，名仁，其先故任城人也。以醫見。」
From the " unitary", " Yi" sound, represent people for medical treatment. "Shuowen": "Healers also work. Annihilation, bad posture. The nature of medicine is natural, you can get wine. Congyou. Wang Yu said. One said: "Annihilation, sickness. Wine cures diseases. "Li" has medical wine. The ancient Wu Pengchu was a doctor." "Book of Rites-The Second Qu Li": "If you do not cure the third world, you should not take the medicine." " Doctor" can mean medical skills and medicine. "Historical Records-Wanshi Zhang Shu Biography": "The man who ordered Zhou Wen in the Langzhong was named Ren, and his deceased was also a native of the city. See by the doctor."

醫字的基本解释

醫
yī
见“医”。

醫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yī］
［《廣韻》於其切，平之，影。］
“医2”的繁体字。
(1)治病的人。
(2)治病，医疗。
(3)医术；医学。
(4)粥加曲蘖酿成的甜酒。
(5)通“翳”。掩蔽。

醫字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　醫； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1287第13
【唐韻】【韻會】於其切【正韻】於宜切，?音翳。【說文】治病工也。【禮·曲禮】醫不三世，不服其藥。【史記·扁鵲傳】爲醫或在齊，或在趙。　又官名。【周禮·天官】醫師掌醫之政令，聚毒藥以供醫事。註醫師，衆醫之長也。【後漢·百官志】太醫令一人六百石。【註】掌諸醫。　又蟲名。【崔豹·古今注】蝘蜓，一名蛇醫。　又【集韻】或作毉。【後漢·郭玉傳】毉之爲言意也。　又【集韻】【正韻】?隱綺切，音倚。【韻會】飮也。【五音集韻】梅漿也。【周禮·天官·酒正】辨四飮之物，二曰醫。【註】醴濁釀酏爲之則少淸矣。　又【集韻】或作醷，亦作臆。【周禮·天官·酒正註】鄭司農說，《內則》漿水臆，醫與臆音亦相似，文字不同，記之者各異耳。此皆一物。【釋文】醷，本又作臆。　又【集韻】壹計切，音医。【周禮·六飮】一曰醫。徐仙民讀。

考證：〔【周禮·天官】醫師。【註】醫師，衆醫之長。【疏】掌醫之政令，聚毒藥以供醫事。〕　謹照原文改醫師掌醫之政令，聚毒藥以供醫
